content: this legal text summarizes a court case where the plaintiff referred to as rp sought repayment of a sum of money plus interest from the defendant referred to as aa the plaintiff claimed that the assets in question belonged to both spouses and should be divided equally while the defendant argued that the assets were separate and not subject to division the court ruled in favor of the plaintiff stating that joint current accounts are presumed to be coowned and funds should be shared equally the defendant was ordered to repay 50 of the amount withdrawn from the accounts in june 2016 along with interest the court also determined that the funds in the accounts were part of the community property and should be divided accordingly the defendant was further ordered to repay additional amounts related to insurance policies and withdrawals from another account the plaintiffs claims for other expenses were dismissed each party was responsible for their own costs the court made a final decision in busto arsizio and ordered the defendant to pay the plaintiff a total of eur 20766204 along with interest the defendant was also required to bear the costs of a technical expert report and pay the plaintiff eur 1300000 for legal expenses and court costs the ruling was made on january 13 2021
